pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools of Total Least Squares in Error-in-Variables Models // Functions for point and interval estimation in error-in- variables models via total least squares or generalized total least squares method. See Golub and Van Loan (1980) doi:10.1137/0717073, Gleser (1981) https://www.jstor.org/stable/2240867, Ivan Markovsky and Huffel (2007) doi:10.1016/j.sigpro.2007.04.004 for more information.
